definition: to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
history/annals/title of an official historian in ancient China
abbr. for Israel 以色列[Yi3 se4 lie4]
to use/by means of/according to/in order to/because of/at (a certain date or place)
to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next

sentences.english: You mean my favorite movie of all time?
sentences.chinese: 你是指有史以來電影我最喜歡哪一部嗎？

sentences.english: Corexit 9500 was found to be one of the most toxic dispersal agents ever developed.
sentences.chinese: 被發現是有史以來生產的最具毒性的分散劑之一。

sentences.english: How would you like to be the author of the greatest science- fiction story ever written?
sentences.chinese: 你願意成爲有史以來最偉大的科幻小說的作者嗎？

sentences.english: The earthquake was the worst calamity in the country's history.
sentences.chinese: 那次地震是全國有史以來最嚴重的災殃。

sentences.english: A year later he was world champion - the youngest ever.
sentences.chinese: 一年過去了，他成爲了有史以來最年輕的世界冠軍。

sentences.english: He is believed to be the most photographed animal of all time
sentences.chinese: 他被認爲是有史以來最上鏡的動物。

sentences.english: Nokia has just announced its worst-ever results.
sentences.chinese: 諾基亞剛剛公佈了它有史以來最差的財報。

sentences.english: Second, China is for the first time ever, the biggest China international rum event.
sentences.chinese: 是中國有史以來第一次最大的中國國際糖酒盛會。

sentences.english: it was historically an African American area.
sentences.chinese: 有史以來就是一個美國黑人聚集區。

sentences.english: Bigelow was only the fourth female ever to be nominated for Best Director.
sentences.chinese: 畢格羅是有史以來第四位獲得最佳導演提名的女性。

sentences.english: Amor. The 9000 series is the most reliable computer ever made.
sentences.chinese: 9000型系列是有史以來最可靠的電腦。

sentences.english: This has been the most closely watched and carefully scrutinized pandemic in history.
sentences.chinese: 這是有史以來受到最嚴密監測和認真甄別的大流行病。

sentences.english: Mrs Xu Mu is the earliest and distinguished patriotic woman poet in history.
sentences.chinese: 許穆夫人是有史以來最早而傑出的愛國女詩人。

sentences.english: Throughout history, the family has been a vital unit for survival.
sentences.chinese: 有史以來，家底就一直是一個生存的重要單元。

sentences.english: Here are the most damaging animals ever to enter U.S. soil. By Cassie Rodenberg
sentences.chinese: 這裏說的是有史以來入侵美國的最具破壞性的動物。

sentences.english: The grito was cancelled in Ciudad Juarez for the first time in its history.
sentences.chinese: 華瑞茲市有史以來第一次取消了多洛雷斯呼聲。
